title: Updated Champion Abilities in client
body:
I went in game to have a look individually without being flooded with a massive wall of text about the new updated champs and they weren't updated with 6.9. I'm on OCE so 6.9 is live but for champs like Zyra, Cassiopiea and Malzahar some of the ability videos are not correct even though the descriptions are.

thought this might need addressing

replies.body: This always happens dude but usually they cover the reworks on a separate page like new champions, so they get the clips from in-game and Phreak dubs over them for the champ spotlight. But they were in a rush to get this update out, (plus it was heaps of champs on one page), so they didn't have time to put them in the client. Give it a few days I reckon.
